New Records: Sri Lanka executed the highest-ever chase in UAE.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka pulled off an absolute thriller vs Bangladesh in a knock-out clash and defeated them by two wickets.
Asitha Fernando turned out to be an unlikely hero as he scored 10 off just 3 balls.
Afif Hossain and Mahmudullah added 57 runs in just 6.1 overs for the fifth wicket.
Mosaddek Hossain played a brilliant cameo, smashing 24 off nine balls.
Mendis scored 60 off just 37 deliveries and led from the front for Sri Lanka.
Pre-Game Insights: The match garnered a lot of attention due to a statement by Sri Lankan skipper Dasun Shanaka and a counter-reply by Bangladesh team manager Khaled Mahmud Sujon.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Skipper Shakib Al Hasan completed 6000 runs in all forms of T20 (domestic and international) cricket.
